description: Respiratory Disturbance Index at 4% desat.  Ratio of the count of all apneas (central and obstructive) and hypopneas associated with at least a 4% oxygen desaturation to the total sleep time expressed in hours. [(Total number of apneas and hypopneas associated with >= 4% desat) / (hours of sleep)]
calculation: 60 * ( hrembp4 + hrop4 + hnrbp4 + hnrop4 + carbp4 + carop4 + canbp4 + canop4 + oarbp4 + oarop4 + oanbp4 + oanop4 ) / slpprdp
